definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉
Xu Beihong (1895-1953), famous European trained painter and influential art teacher
Li Hung-chang or Li Hongzhang (1823-1901), Qing dynasty general, politician and diplomat
Wong Fei Hung (1847-1924), famous martial artist and revolutionary
variant of 紅運|红运[hong2 yun4]
(bird species of China) swan goose (Anser cygnoides)

Feast at Hongmen/(fig.) banquet set up with the aim of murdering a guest/refers to a famous episode in 206 BC when future Han emperor Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] escaped attempted murder by his rival Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3]
variant of 宏圖|宏图[hong2 tu2]
lit. plaintive whine of geese (idiom); fig. land swarming with disaster victims/starving people fill the land
Ku Hung-ming or Gu Hongming (1857-1928), Malaysian man of letters, highly regarded for his literary works written mostly in English, and known for his monarchist views
light as a goose feather (idiom); trifling/unimportant
Cui Hong, historian at the end of Wei of the Northern Dynasties 北魏

sentences.english: Peishan asks Zhenghong to join in her plan to take revenge on Jinlong and Mingzhang.
sentences.chinese: 佩珊邀正鸿加入计划向金龙和明章报仇。

sentences.english: Zaitian takes back Xin Fu and decides to start from scratch with the help of Zhenghong and the rest.
sentences.chinese: 再添决定拿回新富，与正鸿和众多朋友从新开始。

sentences.english: MV Doulos berthing at Sim Kheng Hong Port, Pending, Kuching.
sentences.chinese: 停泊在古晋沈庆鸿码头的《忠仆号》。

sentences.english: The latest album of Li Jianhong, "The Brief History of Time" is released by Post-concrete Records, U. S.
sentences.chinese: 李剑鸿最新专辑《时间简史》由美国厂牌后具象发行。

sentences.english: The underground continuous wall has been adopted in the foundation pit support of the super high building of Hongji Commercial and Trade Center.
sentences.chinese: 鸿吉商贸中心超高层建筑的基坑支护采用地下连续墙。

sentences.english: Jinlong, now a wanted man, secretly attends the wedding of Jiahui and Zhenghong.
sentences.chinese: 金龙悄悄地出席佳慧与正鸿的婚礼。

sentences.english: Only HONGWEI's search consultants may have access to your information and aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 只有鸿为的搜寻顾问可能接触你的信息和愿望。

sentences.english: Dr. CHUNG Chin Hung, Chairman, presented the work for the coming year and the future direction.
sentences.chinese: 主席钟展鸿医生介绍来年的工作及未来的方向。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter discourses upon the influence hi literature by Hong-Du Men Xue and Cao' family tradition.
sentences.chinese: 第五章探讨鸿都门学与曹氏家风对文学的影响。

definition: pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
(of the day) long/old variant of 暢|畅[chang4]
